segments.text: I'm very grateful for what you have done to my son , doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all tight , Mr.Smith.That ' s my job . I'm very glad he recovered so soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know he has brought great trouble to you . A million thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No trouble at all . He's very cute and brave . By the way , do remember to keep him away from sea food for at least two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will . It's most thoughtful of you .
segments.speaker: S1
